gw.api.database.upgrade

Class DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.database.upgrade.DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDatamodelChange<D>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DeletePropertiesButNotColumnsIfSafeDatamodelChange, DropColumnsButNotPropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange

    public class DropColumnsAndDeletePropertiesIfSafeDatamodelChange
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDatamodelChange<D>
    Checks that the given columns on the given table are safe to drop, i.e. for each column: - it is not defined in the datamodel, and - it only contains the default value given If the column is defined in the datamodel, the column is not dropped. If the column is not defined in the datamodel and has only default values, the column is dropped. If the column is not defined in the datamodel and has non-default values, a version check error is thrown. Works in tandem with {@see DropColumnsIfSafeVersionCheck}.

      The archived document version trigger to execute. Null if nothing to do for the archived document upgrade.
